title: abhimanamennaDu galguraa
sahitya:
abhimAnamennaDu galgurA anAthuDaina nAdupai nIku

(abhimAnamennaDu)



anupallavi



aparAdhamulanni mannimpumayya abhirAma paTTAbhirAma nA

endu 

(abhimAnamennaDu)



caraNam



kanna talliyu kanna taNDriyu anniyu nivEyani namma lEdA

ninnuvinA gati nA kevaru lErE nannu brOvu tyAgarAja

vinuta 

(abhimAnamennaDu)
